name: Central Luxury Apartment
address: 17 Ngo Tram, Hoan Kiem district, Hanoi, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Featuring free WiFi, Central Luxury Apartment is situated in Hanoi, 100 metres from St. Joseph Cathedral. Ngoc Son Temple is 500 metres from the property.

Featuring a terrace, all units are air conditioned and include a seating and dining area. Some units feature a balcony and/or patio. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a fridge.

Central Luxury Apartment also includes a terrace.

Hoan Kiem Lake is 500 metres from Central Luxury Apartment. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 21 km from Central Luxury Apartment.
